description: SMPD files can be saved in either a compressed or uncompressed format.

NOTE: Sc2gears is able run in the background and detect when a StarCraft II game has started and stopped (in Windows only). Therefore, it can track mouse movements for the exact duration of a game and automatically generate an SMPD file when the game is finished. To enable this feature, choose Settings → Miscellaneous settings... from the application menu, select the "Mouse print" tab, and then check the "Save mouse prints of all games" option (note that you must also have APM Alert enabled for it to work).
You can create a mouse recording manually in Sc2gears' "Mouse print recorder" window by pressing the Start recording button. Press the Stop recording button to end recording.
